description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 2, 3, 4} mod 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 2, 3, 4, 8]; [n le 5 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-4)-Self(n-5): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 16 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
